Package peregrine.util

Util classes for use (crypto, queues, etc).

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Lifecycle Simple interface for service that can startup and shutdown.
MarkCollection<K> Data structure which can keep collections of marks around a given key.
MarkListener<T> Used to listen to a MarkSet or MarkMap for changes.
 

Class Summary
Base16 Base16 - encodes 'Canonical' Base16.
Base64 Base16 - encodes 'Canonical' Base16.
Charsets Various charset shortcuts including static references of Charsets for performances.
Dates Various utility methods for working with dates.
DefaultThreadFactory Thread factory which names the given thread based on a class template and makes it a daemon thread as well.
DirectMemoryAllocationTracker Track memory allocations of direct memory.
Doubles  
Duration Render a given date value as a human readable string.
ExecutorServiceManager Keeps track of ExecutorService instances per a given class.
Floats  
GenericMessageDigest  
Getopt Simple getopt implementation which doesn't have many features but works for 80% of common usage and doesn't require an external library.
Hashcode  
Hex More advanced Hex encoder vs the normal 'straight' Base16 encoder.
IdempotentCloser A function that is idempotent.
IdempotentFunction<T,E extends Exception> A function that is idempotent.
IncrMap<T> Simpilar to MarkMap but we keep track of and incrementing counter per key.
Integers  
Longs Various utility methods for working with longs.
MapSet<T,V> A MapList is a K->List structure where every key is a list of values.
MarkMap<T,V> Data structure which contains a key to mark map.
MarkSet<T>  
MD5 MD5 cryptographic hash function: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MD5 MD5 should generally be deprecated but for key generation purposes where performance is a factor MD5 is much faster (especially when testing).
MemoryAllocationTracker Track memory allocations.
NonceFactory A simple nonce system which tries to prevent identical message IDs from being handed out in a distributed system.
ObjectFormatter Format an object by reflecting its fields and building an optionally multi-line pretty printed string.
SHA1 SHA1 cryptographic hash function: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SHA-1
SimpleBlockingQueue<T> Uninterruptable version of LinkedBlockingQueue.
SimpleBlockingQueueWithFailure<T,E extends Exception> Version of SimpleBlockingQueue which allows the producer to send exception up into the consumers so that they can then throw these to callers.
Split Various utility methods for working with strings.
Strings Various utility methods for working with strings.
StructList<T extends MessageSerializable> Parameterized list that deserializes the given list of strings and makes them instances of the given Class which is a MessageSerializable.
StructMap Simple map for dealing with primitive types stored in a type or anonymous map.
ThreadLocalMessageDigest ThreadLocal for the current MessageDigest.
Threads  
Tracepoint A Tracepoint is a stacktrace which we manually emit to the a log file along with a hashcode for debug purposes.
TrackingLatch A CountDown that also tracks how often we await for it.
TrackingLock  
TypedValueMap<T> Map for handling keys and values where the values may be arbitrary types.
VarintReader  
VarintWriter  
 

Enum Summary
MarkListener.Status  
 

Exception Summary
MultiException An exception with multiple causes.
 

Package peregrine.util Description

Util classes for use (crypto, queues, etc).
